required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Alveolar Ridge Preservation on Implant Esthetic Outcomes
clinical_study.official_title: Esthetic Outcomes of Implant-supported Crowns After Alveolar Ridge Preservation With Beta Tricalcium Phosphate and Collagen in the Maxillary Esthetic Zone

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate esthetic outcome of implant supported single crowns after alveolar ridge preservation with beta three calcium phosphate with collagen type I in aesthetic region in upper jaw.

primary_outcome.measure: implant stability analysis at the time of implant placement
primary_outcome.description: Implant stability will be measured by the resonance frequency analysis

primary_outcome.measure: implant stability analysis 3 weeks after implant placement
primary_outcome.description: Implant stability will be measured by the resonance frequency analysis

primary_outcome.measure: implant stability analysis 6 weeks after implant placement
primary_outcome.description: Implant stability will be measured by the resonance frequency analysis

primary_outcome.measure: implant stability analysis 8 weeks after implant placement
primary_outcome.description: Implant stability will be measured by the resonance frequency analysis

primary_outcome.measure: change in pink and white esthetic score 2 months of loading
primary_outcome.description: Pink esthetic scale and white esthetic scale will be used for evaluation of changes in white and pink esthetic parameters for implant-supported crowns

primary_outcome.measure: change in pink and white esthetic score 6 months of loading
primary_outcome.description: Pink esthetic scale and white esthetic scale will be used for evaluation of changes in white and pink esthetic parameters for implant-supported crowns

primary_outcome.measure: change in pink and white esthetic score 12 months of loading
primary_outcome.description: Pink esthetic scale and white esthetic scale will be used for evaluation of changes in white and pink esthetic parameters for implant-supported crowns

secondary_outcome.measure: analysis of new bone formation 2 months after preservation of alveolar ridge
secondary_outcome.description: New bone formation will be assessed by histological analysis and histomorphometrical measurement

secondary_outcome.measure: analysis of new bone formation 4 months after preservation of alveolar ridge
secondary_outcome.description: New bone formation will be assessed by histological analysis and histomorphometrical measurement

secondary_outcome.measure: analysis of new bone formation 9 months after preservation of alveolar ridge
secondary_outcome.description: New bone formation will be assessed by histological analysis and histomorphometrical measurement

arm_group.description: preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 2 months
preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 4 months
preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 9 months

intervention.intervention_name: preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 2 months
preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 4 months
preservation of alveolar ridge with beta tricalcium phosphate + collagen - 9 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy patients according to Classification of American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA I)
- presence of 4 socket walls
- non-smokers
- good oral hygiene
- good occlusion
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with alveolar ridge height less than 12 mm
- presence of acute or chronic oro-facial pain
- acute periapical infection
- injured soft tissue
- patients who had dental interventions in last 7 days
- patients who had any medications within last 24 hours
- patients with bruxism and para-functions
- patients with allergies to any of applied materials
